channel.title: Our Projects on IIBMers
channel.description: Recent content in Our Projects on IIBMers

item.title: Bernardo
item.description: Description Bernardo is a plant growing automation system, it has 3 levels Level 1 Bernardo is a 3D printed open hardware with a capacitive moist sensor and a microcontroller (Arduino or ESP) and activates a pump to water your plants when humidity is low.
